input.body:
"There is nothing impossible to they who will try"
Alexander the Great

{{step_5[0]}}

Events for the month:

{{step_5[1]}}

We love opportunities to celebrate, and in the month of {{step_16['currentMonth']}}, we had celebrations for;

{{step_5[2]}}

These team members all celebrated something special in the month of {{step_16['currentMonth']}}. We love and appreciate you all! eHealthers, pls let’s all appreciate them in whatever way we can.

{{step_5[3]}}

Announcements

{{step_5[4]}}
Did you know that….
  • You are required to submit your office laptop before going on leave and all handover notes and discussion should be done 2 days before the intended leave day.
  • There are mediums available to collect your feedback about work experience. Identifiable mediums are via mails (complaints@e4email.net, hr@e4email.net), the office improvement channel, and physical discussions. Anonymous mediums are via the suggestion box in the kitchen (extreme left of the microwave), anonymous feedback link etc. You can make use of any of these as you deem fit.


Copyright (C) {{step_16['year']}} eHealth4everyone. All rights reserved.
Want to change how you receive these emails?
You can update your preferences or unsubscribe
input.subject: This is a test! for {{step_16['currentMonth']}} {{step_16['year']}} Internal Newsletter

input.text:
Hello there,

I trust you have received the sample for the {{step_16['currentMonth']}} newsletter. May I proceed with sending it out to the targeted audience?

Hey! @channel

The Internal newsletter for {{step_16['currentMonth']}} {{step_16['year']}} has been successfully sent to all targeted audiences.

Thanks!

Hey! @channel

The Internal newsletter for {{step_16['currentMonth']}} {{step_16['year']}} has been successfully sent to all targeted audiences.

Thanks!
